Configuration

.env File

Explain the purpose of the .env file and link to the .env.template.

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=api-key-here
OPENAI_API_KEY=api-key-here
LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY=api-key-here
LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY=api-key-here
LANGFUSE_HOST=https://us.cloud.langfuse.com
AZ_MODEL_CONFIG_PATH=aizynthfinder/models/config.yml
RXN_CLASSIFICATION_MODEL_PATH=reaction_prediction/rfc.pkl

Key Variables:

  • API_KEY: Explain its purpose for securing the local backend.

  • ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: …

  • OPENAI_API_KEY: …

  • LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY, LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY, LANGFUSE_HOST: …

  • AZ_MODEL_CONFIG_PATH: …

  • RXN_CLASSIFICATION_MODEL_PATH: …

  • (Add any other relevant variables)
